description: Remove all typing/keystroke sounds completely. Text appearing on screen should be silent - no click sounds when letters appear. Keep only ambient background sounds like static and electronic hum.

Replace chakra body diagram with text-only results. After quiz, show simple text report listing each chakra status like a classified document: 'ROOT CHAKRA - STATUS: BLOCKED - Grounding needed'. No body silhouette, no colored circles, just text.

Create a new landing page at /cosmo route specifically for ManyChat traffic. Make it an eye-catching, high-converting book sales page. Design: Dark cosmic background with glowing effects. Headline: 'YOU FOUND THE SECRET TRANSMISSION' then 'Your soul led you here for a reason.' Show the book 'COSMIC SOUL QUEST' with glowing edges. Add compelling bullet points about what's inside. Include 3 pricing options (Digital $14.99, Paperback $24.99, Collector $39.99) with BUY NOW buttons. Add urgency: 'Only awakened souls receive this link.' Add testimonial placeholders. Make it feel exclusive and mystical. No navigation - just focused on the book sale.
